attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Take action to ensure that there are suffficient drugs available for NHS patients to get their medical prescriptions filled. In many cases without these vital drugs being available patients lives and well being are at risk.

rejection.details:
At the moment your petition reads: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to joyce justice.

If you wish to create a new petition on this subject, your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
